name: debian_flutter
postCreateCommand: echo 'export PATH=/opt/flutter/bin:$PATH' >> /home/developer/.bashrc && echo 'export DISPLAY=:1' >> /home/developer/.bashrc && echo 'pgrep Xvfb || (Xvfb :1 -screen 0 1280x720x24 &)' >> /home/developer/.bashrc && yes | /opt/flutter/bin/flutter doctor --android-licenses && /opt/flutter/bin/flutter config --no-analytics
